verbs.description: " [ARG0: I] [V: think] [ARG1: this was a very bad week for the Trump team] , " Dershowitz said .
" I think [ARG1: this] [V: was] [ARG2: a very bad week for the Trump team] , " Dershowitz said .
" [ARG1: I think this was a very bad week for the Trump team] , " [ARG0: Dershowitz] [V: said] .
